channel.title: CVE Feed for NTT TechnoCross Corporation -- Installer of MagicConnect Client program
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NTT TechnoCross Corporation -- Installer of MagicConnect Client program

item.title: CVE-2021-20674|2024-08-03T17:45:45.131Z -- ntt%20technocross%20corporation -- installer%20of%20magicconnect%20client%20program
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of MagicConnect Client program distributed before 2021 March 1 allows an attacker to gain privileges and via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory and to execute arbitrary code with the privilege of the user invoking the installer when a terminal is connected remotely using Remote desktop.
